rows.label: qev070203_MSG0001
rows.name: Good heavens! Is that even possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hey, kid! Have you ever seen something that overturned
everything you believed in up to that point?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod and say that you have experienced such a thing.

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say that everything always falls
within the realm of expectation.

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0003
rows.name:
I envy you, kid.
For it seems I've grown overconfident in myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0004
rows.name:
A scant few decades old and already so aware, eh,
kid? I'm sort of impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0005
rows.name:
I thought I'd seen everything in my thousand-plus years
of living.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0006
rows.name:
Myriad time periods, countless planets...
I watched an entire civilization rise and fall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0007
rows.name:
Along the way, I guess I fell into the trap of thinking
I'd figured out everything the universe had to offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0008
rows.name: Heh. What a fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0009
rows.name:
And what did it get me? I fell into a rigid mind-set and
was blinded to the simplest of truths![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0010
rows.name:
So now I need you to bring me some ancient Nopon
artifacts from all over Mira. ...Immediately.
Do you mind, kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Specifically, there are three or so of these objects which
will be key. Collect those, and we can finally lay this
mystery bare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0012
rows.name:
This proof will involve a colossal formula—it's more
work than I can reasonably get through on my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0013
rows.name: I'll need Veven to carry his weight for once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0014
rows.name:
Er, I think I've been fairly useful so far, haven't I?
I was planning to to just continue that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0015
rows.name: Hah! Big words, pip-squeak. I'll hold you to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0016
rows.name:
You can expect to be run ragged while
[ST:playername ] is off relic hunting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0017
rows.name: Hee hee heeeeee ha ha ha! It's finally finished![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0018
rows.name:
It took a small fortune and a complete retool of the
Miramobile, but this new =#o±$4\\\\›* should finally
give us some answers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0019
rows.name:
A machine to measure the sum of everything about this
world. A a less scientific mind might call it...god?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0020
rows.name:
I haven't slept—and the work about killed me—but I I
think it's all worth it, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0021
rows.name:
Yes, you were a lot more useful than I expected, Veven.
...Well? What about you, kid? Find those Nopon relics
yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0022
rows.name:
Great! Installed and ready to go.
I'll fire this sucker up now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0023
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0024
rows.name:
Amazing... No errors so far!
Your algorithm's working like a charm, Veven![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0025
rows.name:
That's good. I looked over that thing so many times I
could likely recite it from memory, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0026
rows.name:
Yes... Yes! /±x*1a... 8%»$... and 4x%°!
And there's the last of it! Eureka! Finally!
The great secret of Mira is—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Wait. What's this? All sequences reversing?
Canceling out entirely? NO! What in the name of
Sir Isaac H. Newton is going on?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0028
rows.name: The the power output's o-o-overheating?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0029
rows.name: Now hold on! This phenomenon...it's precisely as if—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0030
rows.name:
It's going critical, Professor! At this rate,
I think we're going to to lose the Miramobile![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0031
rows.name: Waugh? AAAAAAAAAAAAAAH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: NewText_17
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask how the experiment went.

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0040
rows.name: Sigh

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0041
rows.name:
Shake your head at another experiment
gone horribly, horribly wrong.

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0032
rows.name: Can't you tell from looking, kid?! It failed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0033
rows.name: Yes, yes. Go on. Laugh at the failure if you must, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0034
rows.name:
I don't understand—the =#o±$4\\›* was operating
perfectly. It's like Mira itself is denying my
inquisitiveness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0035
rows.name:
The test points to some vague possibilities, but without
data to back them up, any conclusions I draw are
simply meaningless speculation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0036
rows.name:
Did you figure something out, Professor?
When it began to overheat, it certainly did start acting
so so very strange...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0037
rows.name:
I'm a professor, dammit. A scientist! Giving voice to
meaningless speculation is the death of a logical mind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0038
rows.name:
Look to the next test, Veven! We'll refine and improve
and see the veil torn away from this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0039
rows.name:
Hello, hello! It's your friendly discount recycled and
secondhand goods merchant, Graham, here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0040
rows.name:
Uh...whoa, sorry. Am I interrupting something?
I just dropped by to square us away on all those
parts you bought from me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0041
rows.name:
Wup, wup... The path of invention calls!
New challenges beckon me ever urgently forward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0042
rows.name: Veven, [ST:playername ], you handle the rest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0050
rows.name: Question Graham

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Graham about payment for the parts.

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0060
rows.name: Question Veven

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Veven why Professor B ran away.

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0043
rows.name:
Professor B recently took a small mountain of parts off
my hands—I just swung by to collect my payment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0044
rows.name:
With an extra-special friend-of-the-shop discount,
it comes to an even 100,000,000 credits.
Pretty juicy bit of business, if I say so myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0045
rows.name: Um, I don't...think I can...er, pay that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0046
rows.name:
And the professor is broke from building the
Miramobile, so I doubt he has that kind of money
either?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0047
rows.name:
Er, I don't know? But seeing Graham here reminds me
that the professor burned through an an awful lot of
funds in this last round of research...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0048
rows.name: Don't tell me he ran up a colossal tab?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0049
rows.name:
And figured he could run away to the future without
paying it off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0050
rows.name:
Oh, you little joker! ...No, seriously, that's not funny.
I had to call in some huge favors to wrangle all those
parts together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0051
rows.name: Wait, you're serious? ...Oh crap, you ARE serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0052
rows.name:
If he cheats me out of this tab, my life is over!
I don't even want to imagine it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0053
rows.name:
Does it involve you being used as free labor by a
Nopon caravan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0054
rows.name:
Wait, you ARE joking, aren't you?! Ha ha!
Fled through time... Ha ha ha ha! Oh man, rich.
You Ma-non are such little imps![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0055
rows.name:
Ah ha ha! Such a kidder! Hooooo! Ha ha haaaaaa...
Please be joking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0056
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but I don't think the professor will
be coming back for a while, you know?
But I'll do what I can to to make this right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0057
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0058
rows.name:
Do...do you really think he is from the future?
I mean, do you wonder if maybe this is more than
just a really, really, really elaborate con?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0070
rows.name: Believe

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that you think Professor B is from the future.

rows.label: qev070203_JNK0080
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev070203_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that Professor B always struck you as suspicious.

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0059
rows.name:
Right? I mean, you must be right? Otherwise how could
he come up with with all these amazing inventions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0060
rows.name:
Sure the Miramobile has been one giant failure after
the next, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0061
rows.name:
But his inventions were really solid, don't you think?
I mean, that measuring device was a flawless design
so far as as I could see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0062
rows.name:
Though I can certainly see why you'd have your doubts,
I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0063
rows.name:
Worst case scenario, he's got that technology, right?
I'm sure he'll find a way to to make the money before
the debt crushes him. ...Won't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0064
rows.name:
Right! Everything is going to be absolutely...fine?
In any case, I guess I should track down the professor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070203_MSG0065
rows.name:
Oh, and er...
Thank you for your help, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
